Package com.github.jnstockley

Class Failover

java.lang.Object
com.github.jnstockley.Failover
public class Failover extends Object
Function that manages setting up the failover method and building the failover message to be sent
Version:
1.51
Author:
Jack Stockley

    • sendFailover

      public void sendFailover​(String subject, String message, String link)
      Builds the message to be sent and sends the failover notification
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject line for the failover notification
      message - The body of the failover notification
      link - A link to either the twitch stream(s) or to view the new update, otherwise link won't be added to message

    • addFailover

    • failoverEnabled

      private static boolean failoverEnabled()
